thread.title: Sally
thread.title_full: Country Attire Ltd. (www.countryattire.com) reviewed by Sally

author: Sally
title: Sally
text:
I've always wanted this jacket and I finally purchased it in the sale. I ordered the size up but it was too big so reordered my normal size which is perfect. My money was refunded really quickly which was great.
The jacket is slightly short on the arms but not enough to worry about. I am slightly larger on the bust so it's snug but not too tight. It's lovely!!!
